attributes.review:
today i decided to get the trump app to support our lovely cheeto of a president. as soon as i opened the app i saw this fortune teller who looked kinda like barney pop up from out of my phone. she told me that i should not ever use the app again because i will het cursed for eternity. i decided to disobey her and open the app once more. THIS WAS A HUGE MISTAKEEE!!!!! as i opened the app a rabid possum jumped through my window and started attacking me. i was them sent to the hospital and turns out i got rabies. next thing i know the doctor is a blood sucking vampire sucking the blood from my neck. his excuse was that it was for a blood drive at the hospital. i then had to escape from him so i jumped out the window and ran into the bushes to hide from him buttttt turns out the bushes werenâ€™t bushes after all, i had actually jumped into another dimension. in the dimension i jumped into everyone is an emoji, except for me. there are all different kinds like ware wolf mojis, ninja mojis, pangolin mojis, and even george lopez mojis. i quickly made friends with the mime moji. he was very nice but then one day he took me to this abanded house and locked me in there. he didnâ€™t say anything obviously so i was stuck! turns out the house wasnâ€™t abandoned after all, there were actually over 28,000 cat ladies living there with over 5 million cats. the cats had a lot of anger issues too. every time i would try to pick them up by their tail or tongue theyâ€™d starch me and bite me like i did something wrong! now iâ€™m stuck in this moji dimension with all the angry cat mojis. someone please help! and whatever you do DONT GET THIS APP!!!!!

thank you for listening to my ted talkğŸ˜Œâœ¨
